intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the first release of the unstable 1.5 release series. The 1.5 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2 and 1.4 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework. The unstable 1.5 release series will lead to the stable 1.6 release series in the next weeks, and newly added API can still change until that point.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided separately during the unstable 1.5 release series.

p.i: "Such ingratitude. After all the times I've saved your life."

intro.p: A collection of plugins you'd want to have right next to you on the battlefield. Shooting sharp and making no mistakes, these plugins have it all: good looks, good code, and good licensing. Documented and dressed up in tests. If you're looking for a role model to base your own plugin on, here it is.

If you find a plot hole or a badly lip-synced line of code in them, let us know - it is a matter of honour for us to ensure Blondie doesn't look like he's been walking 100 miles through the desert without water.

This module contains a set of plugins that we consider to have good quality code, correct functionality, our preferred license (LGPL for the plugin code, LGPL or LGPL-compatible for the supporting library). We believe distributors can safely ship these plugins. People writing elements should base their code on these elements.

Other modules containing plugins are:
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-plugins-bad contains a set of less supported plugins that haven't passed the rigorous quality testing we expect, or are still missing documentation and/or unit tests gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: matroskamux: wrong duration on some files

rtpsession: Also report internal sources in on-new-ssrc and on-ssrc-active

rtspsrc: seeking is broken
multifilesink: add support for time based file switching

qtmux: does not store stream specific tags
qtmux: Error out when downstream is not seekable and no fast-start
osxaudiosrc: Produces broken audio for any sample rate other than 44100Hz
wavparse: loops on incorrect wav file
rtspsrc: Extract the payload type from sdp framesize attribute
rtpjpegpay/-depay: Remove incorrectly introduced framesize SDP attribute
rtph263pay/-depay: add framesize SDP attribute

playbin downmixes 5.0 multichannel-audio to stereo
multiudpsink: use sendmmsg() to send multiple packets to multiple recipients in one go
udpsink: client add/remove from app blocked while render function is stuck in g_socket_send_message()

Lockup while using Cheese on 1.3.91
wavenc: does not support more than 2 channel

h264 payloader : append packetization-mode parameter for SDP

RTP Jitterbuffer shouldn't force clock-rate on the caps

udp: fix udpsrc documentation
y4mencode : port y4m encoder to use GstVideoEncoder base class
gstrtpjitterbuffer: requests retransmission periodically when no needed

multipartdemux: caps are NULL in pad-added callback (regression)

gdkpixbufdec: free query after use
qtdemux: avdec_mjpeg does not get autoplugged for mjpeg in mov container
v4l2: set min_latency for output device according to required minimum number of buffers

v4l2: query crop configuration after each call of S_CROP
gdkpixbufdec: packetized mode logic
multifile: don't bitwise OR the same flag twice

avi: Removed redundant assignment
avi: Removed unwanted hdl variable

matroska: Removed unwanted instruction
rtpmanager: Removed unwanted variable and assignment

rtpmanager: Removed unwanted assignment in rtpsession

rtsp: Precedence in expression is not clear
qtdemux: handle AAC audio without ESDS atom

interleave: interleaving does not respect the channel positions default order

rtspsrc: set stream caps on internal src TCP pads

videobox: critical error when element properties set as max/min
rtpjitterbuffer: ensure rtx_retry_period > = 0

Port server-alsasrc-PCMA.py to version 1.x
Seeking through some AAC file freezes my application

Fixes to osxaudiosrc and osxaudiosink
